strings.ITEM_FLATHEALTH_PICKUP: Gain 25 max health and increase the strength of healing.
strings.ITEM_FLATHEALTH_DESC: Increases <style=cIsHealing>maximum health</style> by <style=cIsHealing>25</style> <style=cStack>(+25 per stack)</style>. <style=cIsHealing>Heal +{0}</style> <style=cStack>(+{1} per stack)</style> more.
